game.title: My Game
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a lone survivor must navigate dangerous environments and battle fierce creatures to save humanity.
game.beginning: The game starts with the player waking up in a desolate wasteland, unsure of what happened or how they ended up there. They must scavenge for supplies and gradually piece together the events that led to the downfall of civilization.
game.ending: After many trials and tribulations, the player discovers a hidden laboratory where a group of scientists have been working on a cure for the deadly virus that caused the apocalypse. With the help of the scientists, the player is able to develop a vaccine and distribute it to the remaining survivors, ultimately saving humanity from extinction.
